review_data.title: Good pizza
review_data.content: Pizzeria Furetto is located next to Hallenstadion. They have mainly pizza and pasta on the menu. The restaurant itself is nothing special but the food we received was good. The penne arrabbiata were really hot and the pizza Margherita was crispy and nice.
